Html:
Hi,

I would like to be able to place constraints on the plotter such that I can limit the minimum and/or maximum size of the value range that auto fit will operate on.

For example, in the following:

http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dfbww44_19dvf3cvgw

On the top graph, I would like to be able to constrain:

The maximum x range to be -60 to 0.
The minimum y range to be 0 to 50.

On the bottom graph, I would like to be able to constrain:

The maximum x range to be -60 to 0.
The maximum y range to be 0 to positive infinity.

If one or more data point values exceed a minimum for an axis, the graph would scale appropriately in that plane.
If a data point exceeds the maximum for an axis, the graph would not scale past the maximum for that plane.

Cheers,

Nick
